website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best model for travel with battery option and water bottles for tanks.
pros: Handy timer with auto shut-off feature
Quiet operation and adequate vapor production for a hotel room
Fits easily in a carry-on or suitcase
cons: Top-heavy and can fall if not handled gently

customer_reviews.title: Just add to cart now
customer_reviews.text: First of all don't look any further for a personal humidifier. This product is small but very powerful for its size. I spend a lot of time traveling and in hotels in the state of Colorado. This product has helped with slight to moderate dry throat and dry noses. This product starts working the second you plug it in. Also as a bonus the company emailed a letter to let the buyer know how to use and what bottles are compatible, then a few days later they send another email to see if you still like the product and how it's working for you.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Vincent

customer_reviews.title: VERY Happy Customer :)
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I travel to Las Vegas from Houston a few times a year and the climate change is so drastic that I usually am in pain from being so dried out!! I used this product every night during my stay and felt great!! I even came home and didn't get sick like I usually do after travelling! I would definitely recommend this to anyone who needs a convenient humidifer that is easy to travel with and move around!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin (Main)

customer_reviews.title: Terrible leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a while ago and it worked well although I only used it occasionally. I recently had sinus surgery and was told that I needed a vaporizer so I plugged it in and it leaks. It leaks from the top where the bottle is attached with the small attachment that came with the vaporizer. At first I didn't know this so it ruined a wooden table. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: It is so dry in my building at work but we are not allowed to plug things in so I needed something battery powered and this product works so well!! Once I figured out there was an adapter for the water bottle lol for the first day I just kept pouring a bit of water into the top lol
customer_reviews.author: Brittney A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long flights!
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I take a long flight my nose usually gets stuffed up, my throat becomes dry, eye becomes dry, every damn thing becomes dry. But with this, I'll just switch it on, put it beside me, fall asleep and wake up feeling refreshed instead of my usual zombified look. I live in Singapore and it's easy to find a bottle to fit this due to the adaptor they provided with the humidifier. Edit: My bottle adaptor broke due to my carelessness of over tightening the bottle nozzle but thanks to their 10/10 customer support, I was able to replace it. I must say, Fancii has one of the best customer supports ever, they reply fast and are very helpful:).
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan fan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, with one frustrating drawback.
customer_reviews.text: This is, for all intents and purposes, a great portable humidifier. However, it has one major annoyance (not a deal breaker), the LEDs are WAY too bright for putting right next to you as you sleep. They will keep up the average sleeper in my opinion and they should change them to a subtle orange or softer tone LED that wouldn't be so bright.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling with kida
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for traveling with kids! We spend alot of time on the road (wanderlust is is totally a thing!) and my kids always wake up coughing because of the dry air everywhere, making the trip misserable from that point on. This is the perfect portable humidifier for traveling. Pro- small, easy to use, 8/4/2 hour run times, easy to dry out for storage, came with two extra wool inserts that hold the water Con-does not fit all bottles perfectly (I added a plastic barrier and that helped to stop the leak but a bit annoying to get it perfect) we started with a Walmart brand 12 pack bottle and it leaked, a pop bottle fit great
customer_reviews.author: J Bridell

customer_reviews.title: It's compact and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and quiet. I like the time function. Would have been 5 stars if the output was better, but still a great buy. Update 1/29/18: After about 16 months of use, it stopped all mist function. I did all the maintenance I could and when that didn't work, I contacted Fancii. They were awesome. They did some troubleshooting with me and when none of that worked, they sent me a code for a free replacement. Amazing customer service and I'm thrilled to be hydrated again! My dry eyes can't be without it! Five stars for Fancii!
customer_reviews.author: CJShopper

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than one week.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for travel. I did exactly as the instructions said, but despite this, water leaked into the mechanism and it stopped working in a little less than a week. Having the water bottle face down and drip into the machine is a terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: So far I feel it is a great product and would highly recommend it for a single ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this Personal Mini Humidifier on my night stand by my bed ... Yesterday I woke up with congestion and with warm weather at this odd time, my sinuses are acting up. Last night I used it till I was ready to turn out the lights, and adjusted the setting to 4hours ... when I woke in the morning my nose passages were open and the unit turned off while I was sleeping. So far I feel it is a great product and would highly recommend it for a single person's use. A larger one would be too close to bed linens and a fabric chair. Thank you for making this Personal Humidifier...!
customer_reviews.author: Tedbear

customer_reviews.title: Produces very little mist and sends only a short distance
customer_reviews.text: I much prefer my air o swiss ultrasonic travel humidifier which is only slightly bigger than this, but produces far more mist. For example a 16 oz water bottle will go for days in this Fancii humidifier, vs. runs empty in a few hours in my air o swiss -
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with a three-nager
customer_reviews.text: My awesomely unpredictable Three year old seems to frequently have some type of cold, typical Three, and this is amazing. It works perfectly out of the box. Make sure you install the hard plastic ring to screw the bottle into and the correct bottle. An old Pepsi zero bottle did the trick for us. The only thing that I wish I could change is the brightness of the indicator lights. They are very bright. They don’t keep Three awake but I definitely notice it. Overall I highly recommend....at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: This thing has a dedicated place in my luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Doing a lot of traveling, I have always struggled with nose bleeds and headaches when going to higher altitudes and drier climates. Will this humidifier do as good a job as a full-size..of course not! What it does do, though, is add enough humidity to the air to keep me comfortable and feel much better in the morning. Put this guy on your bedside table and point it at yourself, and let it do its thing. Note - it works on batteries, but it puts out a lot more humidity when it's plugged in. I use Daisani or Smartwater bottles - these seal really well. I really recommend this and tell all my co-workers about how great it is!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I can't really give you a specific answer on all of these questions because it worked wonderfully for two days and then after that it continued to act like it was possessed and worked at will and worked nothing nearly as well as it did the first 48 hours
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ascencio

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous help when I needed it. A winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier over a year ago but didn’t need it until now. When I get a cold it immediately goes into bronchitis and I need to breathe the moist air to open the passageways. We spend the winters in an RV and a full size humidifier would take up too much room. ( I have one for home use. ) I got a cold 2 days ago and yesterday I had severe bronchitis. This little machine worked wonders for me. I don’t know how long it will last but if I get a few uses out of it I’ll buy another when it quits.
customer_reviews.author: Dick S.

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: the product is missing the clear rubber ring in the center. expected it to be a good product but looks defective and missing parts The product is useless coz it makes a ringing sound and doesnot work effectively
customer_reviews.author: spu

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget to have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, he has been working out of town the past few months and spending a lot of nights in hotels. He has always had issues with nosebleeds, so I was worried he would have some problems while sleeping in a room without a humidifier- since we usually have one running at night at home. He said he turns it on low and it will put out a good amount of mist and last all night, and still have some water left in the morning. Plus it's so small so it's easy to pack for the road. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS LITTLE HUMIDIFIER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LITTLE HUMIDIFIER! Because I live in New England, where winters can feel never ending, my house gets very dry from the heat being on constantly. I've tried a regular size humidifier in the bedroom only to get that damp, clammy, feeling of too much moisture on the sheets. I saw the reviews for this little baby and thought I'd give it a try and it is great! Enough moisture so that you don't wake up all stuffed up but no clammy feeling in the room...even with it on right next to the bed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JeepLady

customer_reviews.title: The little humidifier that could!!
customer_reviews.text: The little humidifier that could!!! I have been traveling much more for work lately and hotel air is so darn dry. I have terrible sinus headaches. So I bought this little cutie!! So easy to use, weighs nothing, takes no room in your suitcase and works so well. I put it on my nightstand at the hotels and I don't wake up all dried out and in pain. I use a Smartwater bottle and the adapter works perfectly. The company is great with communication!!
customer_reviews.author: Yoneet S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, how much moisture could this tiny thing produce? Not too much, but it’s consistent and it’s fabulous for small spaces. I was getting over a cold and my office is dusty, this thing was a life saver. It’s quiet, very portable, and unobtrusive at work. Brought it to my Mom because she’s sick, and now she’s carrying it around everywhere she goes. It doesn’t take the place of a high-producing humidifier with varying output levels, but it’s perfect for what it’s meant to be - a portable, small humidifier. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Teach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the traveler!
customer_reviews.text: What a mighty little humidifier! Was perfect to pack anywhere for our trip to (DRY) Utah. Kept it running every night and while we were home. Impressed by the power of it and little to no noise. The buttons aren't too user friendly for big fingers where you have to push it a couple times to get what you want since its basically one button. Only wished it had a plugin come with it! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I did return this but it was such a cool idea I dont regret trying it. I live in an area with very harsh water and maybe if I had used filtered it would have been better but after a couple uses it stopped working. as I mentioned this could have been because of the water quality but since thats what I have I just couldn't make it work for me. when it did work i was happy with it, was easy to use, I had a small coke bottle and it did fit. small amount of water kind of like a oil diffuser is what comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Doot

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle problems
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find a bottle to fit it. So much so that I have not been able to even use it yet. Will probably have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: SharonKay19

customer_reviews.title: So I definitely like this thing and it works well
customer_reviews.text: So I definitely like this thing and it works well, but this thing sucks up batteries so quickly. I don't have the option to plug it in because the cord is short and the hotel I'm in doesn't have a plug near by the nightstand available. I've been using it for 5 nights and it's about ready to have the batteries changed a second time (that's 6 AA batteries). I'll definitely use the cord when I have the option.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Bear

customer_reviews.title: turns off automatically
customer_reviews.text: easy to throw in a bag while traveling and most hotels have a USB port somewhere in the room these days. It shut off automatically after some time and only vaporizes about 1/3 of a 1 litter bottle. I was disapointed to wake up and see it wasn't running all night. You may need to poke a hole in the top of a bottle to avoid a vacuum forming
customer_reviews.author: B. Sautner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small room
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier. It is perfect for a small room and the mist is just right. It would also be a perfect humidifier for travelers. It took me some experimentation to get the timing like I wanted. The distributors email and instructions with the unit were not consistent. After playing with the buttons, I learned just what to do. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Murray

customer_reviews.title: This humidifier is great
customer_reviews.text: I work in animal rescue. This small humidifier is perfect for kittens who have nasal congestion. I live in Arizona and the air can be brutally dry for tiny noses. It is very portable which is important in working with kittens. And I don’t have to isolate them in a bathroom. Will recommend to all cat people. I agree a bottle like Dasani fits very tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: overall love it
customer_reviews.text: practical, compact does it's job, but I dinged them one star for not including the replacement filters UPDATE : Love this product, but water pools underneath, so much that i have to place towel underneath. i have tried other reviewers suggestions, but no solution. disappointing, since my co-worker's unit experiences no such problem. how can this be solved? i had to subtract another 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Limited usage time.
customer_reviews.text: This is great except it only stays on for a really short time, so not useful for me, I do not consider it effective.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a week ago, but it took me a long time to set up, mostly because I kept forgetting to buy a regular size neck water bottle. Overall great product, I like that it can stay on for up to 8 hrs because some of the other mini humidifiers turn off after 4-6 hrs. My room is pretty small so it fits my needs and it doesn't take up any space. I will be taking this with me during my travels! (It was a little difficult to insert the batteries because of the placement. I honestly thought I was about to break the coil, just hold down the top coil as low as you can.)
customer_reviews.author: Yfancui

customer_reviews.title: Super customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Super customer Service, would buy from again. Great little humidifier for the nightstand. Make sure you buy the right sized bottle as stated. I found a plant mister bottle worked great and lasted all night as well. The coke sized bottles were hard to find for me. Also there are 4 timed settings from 2 hours to nonstop, a nice feature. The LED light is very bright for night time use, but if you roll some tissues or paper and wedge it over the button area below the mister, it helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Seaside Gal

customer_reviews.title: We bought two (2) of them and they work fine and we didn't have any problems with the adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two (2) of them and they work fine and we didn't have any problems with the adapter cracking as mentioned in previous posts. The adapter only required moderate finger tightness to both the water bottle and the base. Water consumption is less than 10 ozs in an 12 hour period which is about the same battery life length. Surprisingly it raised the humidity level in a 14FTx20FT room 5% in the same time period. Overall we're very pleased with the units.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We were in the mountains where the air is so dry. Used this and it really helped. It is very small for traveling, expeically for us older folks flying. The reviews that said to use particular bottles were helpful. I used a smart water bottle - strong enogh to stand upside down and enough rings on the lid to stay. it puts out way more steam on the cord than battery so use it if you can. It comes with a plug and everything else you need. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Barbmom

customer_reviews.title: Effective, quiet, but eats batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I had medical need for increased office humidity and this device was recommended by a coworker. Saw some pro and con reviews and took a chance on the item. Overall quite satisfied. It is incredibly quiet and unobtrusive. It took only a couple days to exhaust 3 AA batteries though, at which point it began to weep water from spray port - probably leading to the problems folks described with puddling on nightstands etc. Easily solved that by switching to running off the USB port of my computer with provided cable. The adapter cap was easy to find in original package but only because I knew to look for it based on reviews and exceptionally helpful e-mail from seller.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions
customer_reviews.text: I travel around the world & I am confined to small places. This works as a gem. I am glad that I read all the reviews before ordering because it prepared me for what to expect. I knew exactly how to use it & what bottles to use with it, just know that whatever surface it sits on will get wet. I will purchase again, I love that it is compact enough to carry and the cool mist is powerful. Good item for the price. I just need to know how often to change the filter & where to purchase?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier for a business trip to OKC. I have only used it for one week in the hotel, but the results were amazing! I used it at night, and it produced plenty of mist and kept my skin and hair from over-drying due to heaters during the cold weather. The only thing I needed to do was "raise" it up by placing on a box due to the night stand being too short. It came with two replacement filters and a water bottle adapter. I plan to purchase another one for my mother. Great product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Randomly doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Barely works on batteries, only works well when plugged in. Not a huge deal if you're not traveling with it, but the portability of it is kind of pointless in scenarios where being run on batteries is more needed than plugging in. When it works, it's great, but there are random time it'll make a high-pitched screeching sound (obviously not appreciated when this happens in the middle of the night). But then turning it off and turning it back on usually resolves the issue. Wish I could give it 5 stars, but it's not consistently great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Rather ineffective, some design flaws
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this humidifier, but sadly it was super ineffective for me. I put it on my nightstand while I was sleeping and it didn’t make one bit of difference. Also, it emits a rather bright light when powered on that is really annoying when you’re trying to sleep. Also, no matter what kind of water bottle I put in it, they always made annoying crinkly sounds as the water was pulled out of them. Bottom line: If you’re looking for a humidifier that actually makes a difference you can find something much more effective for the same price - don’t waste your $ on this like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little gem
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful I am on a several day trip in the Colorado mountains which is painfully dry. This has been a life saver it works like a champ. Literally zero noise. Fits most any water bottle (emptying water bottles by drinking them also helping With hydration!!) only tiny complaint is that the on light is brighter than I’d like especially in dark hotel room. I just put a business card over it and it dimmed it. Wonderful product easy to use does not leak not a drop!!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: RUNS ON BATTERY POWER, WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is excellent. It can run on on AA battery power as well as 5 volt usb power. Not too many humidifiers can do that which makes it very portable. For traveling its the best. I would highly recommend it😃👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Julian B.

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem getting it to work, but the amount of vapor it generates is extremely small. For 8 hours it would vaporize less than 1/2 cup of water. Idea of using a water bottle is good, but the product is not effective, at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chin Kim

customer_reviews.title: worked well for my daughter's coughing
customer_reviews.text: my daughter has been using this for the past few weeks due to the dry air in her class....very quiet and easily attaches with a regular 20 oz Dasani bottle (make sure to use the adapter that it comes with in the box!). we are using 3 AA batteries and it lasted quite a few days before needing replacing. her coughing has been less since getting this personal humidifier, plus it looks pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyTooMuchStuff

customer_reviews.title: Took me a while to figure out how which bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to figure out how which bottle will work and how to get it attached correctly. Instructions stated a regular Coke bottle will work, however I struggled to get it to fit. I purchased several bottles of water before I found the one that does actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy R.

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality!
customer_reviews.text: Amended review: I’ve purchased 3 of these in the past 3 years. As said previously I returned to Fancii as they have been the best cost for length of use. However, the last one 1 purchased was extremely inferior quality lasting only 2.5 months!!! I won’t purchase a 4th!
customer_reviews.author: RISSO

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money😒
customer_reviews.text: It smells like rust and where the mist comes out, ends up filling up with water so no more mist and starts leaking. Wouldn’t buy again and wouldn’t recommend🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Erin A.

customer_reviews.title: Runs on AA batteries or USB and very simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for one day but I really like this thing; it was easy to figure out how to use it and it appears to work well. I like that you can attach a regular water bottle to it, that's a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gabbert

customer_reviews.title: Want to return it
customer_reviews.text: It’s small, easy to carry. But... it does not hold the bottle still, if you accidentally hit it by accident, the bottle will fall, and the water will spill. That’s why I don’t think it’s suitable for a small space even thought the product is small, and it’s not easy to clean if the water spills everywhere. I would have returned it but I accidentally recycled the original box.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Good little humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I like it & it is easy to clean. A regular sized 20oz soda bottle will not quite last through the night. I used a larger water bottle. I use it on my nightstand & it really has to be right by my face in order to work. I don’t like how bright the lights are & had to cover them with a few layers of tape. I also accidentally threw away the directions & have no idea what the 3 different settings mean lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for a trip to Colorado, knowing the dry air would be an issue for me. This worked great and was very easy to use. Recommended it to a co-worker and wold definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: J B and M D

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  A must have for anyone who travels.
customer_reviews.text: This little product is very handy for the traveler. It is great for dry hotel rooms, it is compact and fits easily into any suitcase. The ability to run it off of USB or battery is also very nice. One word of caution, the light on the unit is bright, so turn it away from you when you are sleeping, or cover it with a bit of tape. This did not bother me, but could bother some. Great Product! A must have for anyone who travels.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Henning

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I now travel with this all the time. Takes up very little room in luggage, works great. The only con is that it has a light on it which I cover up while sleeping. I would also say this is an individual humidifier. If traveling with a family you may want two. Others had trouble with certain types of bottles but I had no problem with the bottles with lower necks.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M Stevens

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 3 - they all leak!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three units. One for traveling and one for each child’s bedroom. Loved the idea of the small unit. The reality is that all three leak terribly. We used the adapters and tried a variety of water bottles. Eventually we put the unit in an open plastic container to protect the night stand from leaking. Finally, I boxed up all three units with the intention of returning, but missed the return window. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Makes hotel rooms so much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable humidifier for a work trip after being sick with bronchitis for two weeks. It’s very slim, and so takes up little space in luggage. I brought a Dasani bottle and set it up for the night of my arrival. It worked perfectly and I slept the most comfortably I ever have in a hotel room. It’s easy to assemble with just screwing a water bottle on top, and you turn it on. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: This humidifier feels solid and doesn't have a whole lot ...
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier feels solid and doesn't have a whole lot of moving parts so it should be more reliable in the long run. I will be using it mainly for vacationing to Arizona where the dryness is a killer to my sinuses. The fact that it can be battery powered means I can bring it along and take it to more locations while there.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I work in a pretty big office, that is surrounded by cubicles, the heat some days is unbearable and very dry,.. This is perfect for my desk.. My nose has been pretty moist with this. The fact, that its able to run off a USB, or batteries, is a great feature, and the 2 or 4 hour timer, allows me to not have to remember if i have shut it off. Several of my co-workers have borrowed it to test it, for themselves, they like it as well.... GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Trixe65

customer_reviews.title: Good product, use 20 oz bottle!
customer_reviews.text: You must use a 20 oz water/soda bottle, or it will leak. My colleagues love it, and are curious. It's working so far, but I've only had it going a week. Suggest it not be left full for overnight. It could leak.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little travel humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little travel humidifier. Make sure you take the threaded cap out of the package before throwing the packaging away!
customer_reviews.author: Mdter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier but the spray volume is unstable and I have to clean the spray output every 30 seconds to make it spray smoothly. I talked to John, the owner of this company, who is extremely responsible. After I explained everything to him, he agreed that the humidifier is a defective unit and he sent me a new one immediately. The new one works perfect and I have recommended this product to my friends. Very good shopping expierence!
customer_reviews.author: IX

customer_reviews.title: This Fancii Cool Mist Personal Mini Humdifier works and works well
customer_reviews.text: Since I travel frequently, the hotel room air is typically dry. Especially during the winter months when the heaters are working. This Fancii Cool Mist Personal Mini Humdifier works and works well. I was skeptical at first but after reading the reviews I made my purchase. Good decision. I love that you can pack it easily and use water bottles. But, not all water bottles work..i.e. Dasani. Fuji water bottles work great. Also, it is not plug in and go. You need to hook it up to your laptop via USB port....and it requires 3 AA batteries. It's a minor annoyance but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Picard

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit is small, uses a standard Dasani 20 oz water bottle, is silent and produces enough steam for my smallish bedroom. It also runs 8 hours on one fill up. So easy to use. I was tired of using an old steam humidifier. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta

customer_reviews.title: Travel with a humidifier?  With this little unit, its easy.
customer_reviews.text: Tiny, light weight and great for travel. This little humidifier just plain works great and packs easy. Follow up from the company was excellent as well. Depending on where and how you travel, you might wan't to carry along a plastic bottle. Before we got it, I was afraid this was not going to be a sturdy unit. Well, it proved me wrong. It's been sturdy and has never missed a day of service since we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Yar Mosnar

customer_reviews.title: Great personal humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Well designed product, nice size, detailed included instructions regarding use & options re: the product. A perfect product for use in a small office, personal setting, etc. Functions well. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Hobbs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic compared to others
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget. Other humidifiers are big clunky machines that are a pain in the neck to clean and maintain. This is the size of a hockey puck, and the effort is minimal in comparison. The mist is just right -- not too strong or too weak. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: puzzluver

customer_reviews.title: Love this little mister
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement for another mister that also used a water bottle. The other brand was touchy and sometimes didn't work unless I turned it on and off several times. I've had this one for a few months and it has not failed. It runs next to my bed all night and shuts itself off after 8 hours. I do unplug it every morning as the instructions said. I also run my fingernail over the mist outlet if it doesn't start immediately. I have hard water and think it gets a small mineral coating on it.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Grama

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: not much output, but adequate for a small device that's easy to bring on travel. you have to use a "real" water bottle - like dasani, and not a cheap bottle or it leaks. Other than that, easy to use and great for those dry hotel rooms - but if you want it to help more than one person, get two.
customer_reviews.author: ALF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This little device is easy to use and does a great job. Just make sure you use a brand name water bottle (i.e. Aquafina, etc) and not generic so that it will thread into the device.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Love
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute air diffuser, I ordered it to have right next to my bed while I sleep. I was hoping I would love it but I don’t, the cord is very short so I had to use an extension. I wouldn’t say it’s loud but it makes a very annoying sound when being used, to the point I feel like my ears are ringing. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my plants!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product to tuck in between my tropical plants, recently moved indoors. Love the size and ease of use. Just bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: WirtSC

customer_reviews.title: so simple
customer_reviews.text: I love it. the only thing that is bothersome is the light that is on when the humidifier is working. It keeps me awake. However, I solved the problem by putting a little bit of blue tape over it. Thanks love it!
customer_reviews.author: JN Holland

customer_reviews.title: holding up well
customer_reviews.text: works reliably. I bought this for travel but I've had this in daily operation in the office for months now with no issues. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jay plain

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work OK for the most part. No leaks yet. There are times when it doesn't emit any mist so I have to either wipe off the nozzle or restart it once or twice. Happy with it so far, we'll see how long it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: cjj8206

customer_reviews.title: Fancii Cool Mist Personal Mini Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is very easy to use. You cannot use short neck water bottles like the ones that Sams club sells. An aquafina bottle will work or a soda bottle. It has setting to stay on for 2, 4, or 6 hours. I have not used the batteries, I just keep it plugged into a 5V USB. Great room humidifier. Not big enough to do your whole house. But easy to move to a different room.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hartgerink

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for traveling. My only complaint is there isn’t a way to turn off the on indicator light. When I face the nightstand in the hotel the light is right in my face making it hard to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hotz

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel. I do agree with other customers that you should paint the bottle attachment or mark in some way to prevent from throwing away. It worked exactly as described. No leaks and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy 3

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and works great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for a trip to Chicago and back and it was worth every penny. I'll be sure to pack it for overnight trips from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wick changing
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to probably Amazon (I would assume), the product arrived 2 weeks after I ordered it. Anyway, Please let me know how to change the wick. That way, once it is time to do so, I will know how. thanks. The device works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This works just as advertised and on a recent trip where the hotel's AC/HVAC made the air super dry, it made my sleep and stay in the room, much more bearable. I have used it at home some, but as I try to keep windows open, not as much, but it has made a difference. Thank you for this product. It is convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl_ann44

customer_reviews.title: easy use
customer_reviews.text: Read others reviews about size bottle to use and with adapter no issues. Works well and has 4 setting for length of time you want to run I believe up to 8 hours. Works great in our daughters bedroom. Thinking of buying another for a parent to use in bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: It works. It just does not have the output ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. It just does not have the output that I thought it would. I wanted it for my office, which is not that big, and it just seems not very effective. We have not tried it in our vehicle on a road trip yet and it may be more effective in that situation. Overall ok...just need something with more output.
customer_reviews.author: DGR

customer_reviews.title: Pros - It it very compact and easy to carry around in a luggage bag
customer_reviews.text: Pros - It it very compact and easy to carry around in a luggage bag. It doesn't require a custom made water tank, which is a plus when traveling. I can just buy a bottle of Evian at the airport instead of carrying one in my luggage. It has a USB cord and it can be plugged into a laptop while I am working. It can also run on 3 AAA batteries. Cons - The plastic has a very strong smell and it hasn't gone away after 6 months. The lid for the battery compartment is kind of loose. Haven't used it much since I bought it, so I can't speak to its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Florida G

customer_reviews.title: Great, but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I have had this travel humidifier for exactly a year and 10 days and I am so disappointed that it has stopped working. It was great up until now. I’ve probably only used it about 10 times throughout the year and now the power works, everything seems fine but no mist comes out. The “product support” has already been closed for my order so I am extremely disappointed, since it’s only been just over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Penge

customer_reviews.title: Not working well
customer_reviews.text: This gets very hot after just several hours of operating. The noise level is pretty high. The most frustrating part is a lot of water bottles doesn’t fit even with the adapter. I would go for a different type that doesn’t require specific type of bottle.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Tiny humidifier with huge benefits.
customer_reviews.text: I used to dread hotel stays. The air is always so dry and I feel parched in the mornings. But no more. This little humidifier gives big results. It's easy to pack and only requires a bottle of water to work great. Thank you, thank you, Fancii, for making my hotel stays fun again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris r.

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. We used it in a hotel this weekend and didn't wake up with dry, scratchy throats. It's easy to set up and use. We plan on keeping it in our "to go" pack so that we have it every time we travel to non-humid places. My only suggestion would be to add a little, zippered pouch where you can store all the parts and easily slip it into a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: Only work for the first 20 seconds then blocked
customer_reviews.text: It’s ridiculous. It only works fine for the first 20 seconds, then some of the water mist accumulated in the output hole area, formulating a water puddle, and block the most from coming out. Video attached. Anyone knows if I got a defect one or it is all the same?
customer_reviews.author: X.Li

customer_reviews.title: It is the best small Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I use a large Fuji water bottle and am able to not refill the bottle for two days. This is the second Fancii Mini Humidifier I have bought . I gave one to my sister and she loves it also. I have owned at least five other small humidifiers and this is without a doubt the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy DePasquale

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time and I love it! It puts out a nice amount of steam for such a small machine, but its cool not hot. I have it plugged into my computer with the USB that came with it and I had no problem finding a bottle that fit. For any Michiganders, a 20oz Faygo bottle is perfect! I think I'll get a couple more to give as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces. And traveling
customer_reviews.text: When it says for small spaces it means SMALL PLACES not small bedrooms either. I mean it might work sleeping right under it like in a hotel or something. I use mine in my tractor trailer. Some places with extremely dry air"ie southern AZ" it has a hard time keeping the humidity up. But all in all this is a great little humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: good or bad
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell you I am not one to write reviews on anything, good or bad.... But this machine is truly amazing. I never knew anything like a portable humidifier even existed so when I started researching humidifiers (because mine of many years had finally died) and I stumbled across this I had to try it. It works every bit as well as my big one that just died and the fact that its portable makes it even better. I am seriously thinking of getting a couple more just to scatter around the house. Also I travel a lot so this will absolutely be going with me!
customer_reviews.author: Danelle Curry

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it a few times but it seems to work well. It took us awhile to notice the enclosed adapter to fit screw top water bottles. Once we used adapter, it was easy to use. Batteries do not last very long so we plan to use USB cable in future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple mister that I use at work
customer_reviews.text: My office is dry and this mister keeps the air humidified and comfortable. I like that it works on batteries or USB. I used the USB port off my laptop to run the mister.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY MCCAFFERTY

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had a slight issue with mine not working on battery power but the customer service went above and beyond to remedy the issue and make sure I was a happy customer! Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: The seller was extremely helpful in sending explicit instructions on this device. So far it's working as advertised. Our weather has very low humidity and it's hot so I have to leave the windows open in my camper - I realize I'll have to close the windows to optimize the effect of the humidifier. I mainly got it to put at least some humidity in the camper, especially while I'm gone - so I like it runs on battery and has a timer.
customer_reviews.author: mickietucs

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap, whistles, didn’t work after first hour
customer_reviews.text: Product emits a high pitch whistle and mist doesn’t work half the time. Defective and cheap but a cute design. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my RV!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this small humidifier to use in my RV. I use one at home but it was too large for travel. I'm very pleased with my purchase and I've tried it out and it works perfectly but I haven't used it much. I'm looking forward to vacation so I use it in the RV. I'm very impressed that so far I have had two emails from the company to inquire if I have any questions and to offer some useful tips. This small humidifier is very elegant looking and looks more expensive than it was. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine A.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and great for travel but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like it but the output was not enough for me. It was easy to use and compact for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ruaparatoo

customer_reviews.title: A must to buy!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this! It is the perfect size to sit on my desk at work with out getting in the way and the convenience of being able to plug into my computer saves on batteries. It runs very quiet and puts out a good amount of humidity without making things damp. Loved the email from the seller giving helpful hints!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but cheap execution.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first couple of times and does nothing but malfunction now and soak my bedside table. Great concept but cheap execution. Oh, and don't bother with the batteries. They only last one night at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: It was cute when I first got it and shot out a nice, visible stream of mist. In less than a month, it basically does nothing. No mist coming out any longer at all, and cannot find any way to do anything about it. It just sits there and none of the water gets used.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Fancii Mini Humidifier is pretty FANCY! Received email from John explaining which bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: Fancii Mini Humidifier is pretty FANCY! Received email from John explaining which bottles worked with humidifier, ran right out and bought a bottle of Dasani water, screwed the provided adapter onto the bottle and inserted into humidifier. Works like a charm! I travel frequently for work and needed something for hotel rooms since they are so dry. It's also so small that packing it along with an empty Dasani water bottle won't be a bother. Thanks for the emails John, very nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: cathy klasi

product_meta.title: Fancii Cool Mist Personal Mini Humidifier, USB or Battery Operated Portable Travel Humidifying Device for use with Water Bottles
feature_bullets: Converts a standard sized individual water bottle (<20oz) into a moisture-producing water tank
PureMist ultrasonic technology operates at below 15 decibels, to project hygienic, humidified air quickly and quietly
Compact and lightweight mini humidifier perfect for use in bedroom, office, car, hotel, tent, or even on flights
Cordless feature allows you to take the device anywhere you go | Powered by 3 AA batteries or USB
Adjustable timer allows for 2, 4, 6, and 8 hour automatic shut-off | Intelligent protection when water runs out

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,784 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
